item.title: Globtier Infotech IPO listing: Shares list at 20% discount to IPO price, extend losses to hit 5% lower circuit

review.headline_rewrite: Globtier Infotech IPO listing: Shares list at 20% discount to IPO price, extend losses to hit 5% lower circuit
bullets: Globtier Infotech IPO listing: Shares of Globtier Infotech were off to a poor start on the BSE SME on Tuesday, September 2, as they
Soon after listing, Globtier Infotech shares extended losses to hit the 5% lower circuit of ₹54.72.
The demand for Globtier Infotech IPO also remained tepid, garnering just 1.34 times bids.
Globtier Infotech IPO was a fixed price issue of ₹31.05 crore, with the shares sold at ₹72 apiece.

item.title: NIS Management IPO Listing: Shares make weak debut at  ₹108, down 2.7% from issue price

review.headline_rewrite: NIS Management IPO Listing: Shares make weak debut at  ₹108, down 2.7% from issue price
bullets: NIS Management IPO Listing: NIS Management shares made a weak debut on the bourses on Tuesday, September 2, listing at ₹108 on BSE SME,
The NIS Management SME IPO witnessed solid investor participation, closing with an overall subscription of 3.13 times.
The IPO was open for subscription from August 25 to August 28, 2025.
The funds raised through the IPO are aimed at meeting the company’s working capital requirements and general corporate purposes, including business expansion and operational

item.title: India’s semiconductor leadership forum targets $50 billion industry, 1 million skilled jobs

review.headline_rewrite: India’s semiconductor leadership forum targets $50 billion industry, 1 million skilled jobs
bullets: Projections presented at the launch of the Forum today highlighted a $120 billion domestic semiconductor market by 2030, with the sector poised to generate
The phased strategy envisions foundation building - policy frameworks and infrastructure in 2025-26.
By 2035, India's semiconductor industry is poised to contribute to the country's GDP, the L&T official said.
